title: California Firm Recalls Beef Products Due To Possible Processing Flaw
summary: WASHINGTON, Oct. 6, 2014 Galant Food Company, a San Leandro, Calif. establishment, is recalling approximately 410 pounds of beef products because the meat filling used in the products did not meet its cooking critical limit, the U.S. Department of Agriculture's Food Safety and Inspection Service...
impacted_products: 4.5-oz. Galina’s Original Beef and Cheese Piroshki, 12 or 24 per case, with case codes 092214, 092314 and 092414
5-oz. Paramount Beef Piroshki, 25 per case, with case codes 092314
